content.question: A. Describe a multiparty system.B. Describe the difference between a one-party system and a multiparty system.C. Explain what actions a state could take to move away from a one-party system.D. Explain the impact that multiparty systems can have when governing.

frqParts.text: A. Describe a multiparty system.B. Describe the difference between a one-party system and a multiparty system.C. Explain what actions a state could take to move away from a one-party system.D. Explain the impact that multiparty systems can have when governing.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
